required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation of Four Aesthetic Restorations in Non-carious Cervical Lesions
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Evaluation of Four Aesthetic Restorations in Non-carious Cervical Lesions: a Randomised Controlled Split-mouth Clinical Trial

lead_sponsor.agency: Recep Tayyip Erdogan University Training and Research Hospital

clinical_study.source: Recep Tayyip Erdogan University Training and Research Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: To compare the clinical performance of high-viscosity glass ionomer, flowable composite, bulkfill composite and nanohybrid composite restorations in non-carious cervical lesions (NCCLs).

detailed_description.textblock: One hundred fourty NCCLs were randomised into four groups according to a split-mouth design. Clinical evaluations will be performed after 1 week, 3 months, 6 months, using FDI (World Dental Federation) criteria.

primary_outcome.measure: evaluation of restoration on cervical lesions
primary_outcome.description: According to FDI criteria (aesthetic, biological and fuctional) score 1, clinically very good; score 2, clinically good; score 3, clinically sufficient; score 4, clinically unsatisfactory; score 5, clinically poor. Scores 1-3 show clinically acceptable restoration, while scores 4 and 5 indicate failure

intervention.description: Apply cavity conditioner (20% polyacrylic acid) 10 s on enamel and dentine, rinse Mix 10 s and apply bulk-fill Apply EQUIA coat and light cure for 20 s unit
Apply in 2-mm increment, light cure for 20 s
Apply in 2-mm increment light cure for 20 s
Apply in single increment up to 4 mm; light curing for 20 s

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- had at least four non-carious symmetrical cervical lesions,
- had permanent dentition and were older than 20 years old,
- had cervical margins in dentin
Exclusion Criteria:
- periodontal disease
- pregnant or breastfeeding
- being under orthodontic therapy

overall_official.affiliation: Recep Tayyip Erdogan University Dentistry Faculty

facility.name: Recep Tayyip Erdogan University Dentistry Faculty

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Recep Tayyip Erdogan University Training and Research Hospital

patient_data.ipd_description: Data will be available within 1 years of study completion
